name: SPLAT (Dwagon, cmzhang)
description:
We welcome you to Scientifically Psychic Laboratories and Research, where we are engaged in serious research involving scientifically psychic things…namely, you.

Except you, a devilish psychic with an innate ability to S.P.L.A.T. things around, can appreciate neither laboratories nor research.

Despite your best efforts to fling us around with your mouse, our research must go on!

SPLAT is a single-player action-arcade game that has you destroying enemies and items by clicking and dragging them into each other to escape the lab that's trying to contain you!

-Click and drag items and enemies into each other to destroy them!

-Pick up powerups that give you special abilities that drastically turn the tides of battle!

-Look for keycards hidden within the level to open power doors that block your way!

-Encounter several different types of enemies that use different strategies to fight!

CREDITS

Programming and Design - Coco Zhang and Masato Lin

Art - Luke Todaro

Audio - Bobby Raps
